Purchase Tickets to the Annual Symposium

The entry fee for the symposium is $15 per person. If a pair is entered, the total fee for the group is $30.

If you have any other additional questions please email us at info@socioeconlabs.org

There are no refunds if an individual or pair decide to no longer remain in the symposium.
